inclusion.criterion: Symptoms suggestive of an acute ischemic stroke
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior coronary bypass surgery or percutaneous coronary intervention
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD and recently noted abdominal mass, presenting with fevers/rigors and bandemia. Biopsy results consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
